title: Development of a Mobile Microlearning Mathematics Course Through Collaborative Blended Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: College-level foundational mathematics and experience applying it to professional tasks
context.additional_context: Blended learning design for workplace problem-solving by office workers. Implementation of project-based assessment combining mobile-based microlearning modules with face-to-face collaborative sessions in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively design blended learning scenarios to solve work-related mathematical problems.
Learners can apply mathematical concepts to workplace situations using mobile microlearning content.
Learners can improve and visually represent a blended learning design prototype by incorporating peer feedback
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
